summary: mexican restaurant chipotle has decided to tap into the $ 70 billion food delivery market by teaming up with an app to bring burritos straight to customers ' doors . mexican food fans should know that the restaurant plans to add a nine per cent service charge - with the delivery fees for postmates beginning at $ 5 and up , depending on distance and demand .

aspect: 1. Mexican restaurant Chipotle partners with Postmates app to offer delivery in 67 cities, adding a 9% service charge for deliveries.
2. Chipotle has recently expanded its delivery service to include online and mobile orders.
3. Chipotle is not the only franchise entering the lucrative delivery market, as Starbucks, Taco Bell, McDonald's, and Burger King also have delivery initiatives.
explain: In this aspect, Chipotle, a Mexican restaurant, has partnered with Postmates to provide delivery services in 67 cities. They will include a 9% service charge for delivery.
Chipotle has expanded its delivery service to include online and mobile orders.
